description: Listed Building Consent application in connection with enclosure of front undercroft at basement, replacement metal staircase, new glazed timber framed door to front elevation, conversion of loft space including new roof lights in rear roof slope at second floor level (Full planning application ref: P080074 also submitted)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the approved plans, the enclosure shall be installed under the front entrance bridge. It shall not project beyond the arched area. Detailed drawings of the enclosure and proposed door shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, maintained as such thereafter and no change there from shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.


Reason: To protect the special interest of the Grade II Listed Building
